titles.title: Heart Attack Safety Act of 2005
Heart Attack Safety Act of 2005

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require hospitals and critical access hospitals, as a condition of participation under the medicare program, to meet certain requirements in order to advertise that the hospital has the capability of addressing emergency and acute coronary syndromes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
